subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Lyon won its seventh consecutive French league title by beating Auxerre, 3-1. Lyon finished ahead of Bordeaux, which managed only a 2-2 draw against Lens in its final game of the season.
snippet: Lyon won its seventh consecutive French league title by beating Auxerre, 3-1. Lyon finished ahead of Bordeaux, which managed only a 2-2 draw against Lens in its final game of the season.
